mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_info(btype, rtype, addr, addsub, area, whlarea, flr, myflr, elev, pet, park, mfee, rcmt, rcont, mvdate, rface) VALUES (#{btype}, #{rtype}, #{addr}, #{addsub}, #{area}, #{whlarea}, #{flr}, #{myflr}, #{elev}, #{pet}, #{park}, #{mfee}, #{rcmt}, #{rcont}, #{mvdate}, #{rface})
insert into room_option(ac, washer, fridge, tv, stove, microw, bed, desk, closet, shelf) values (#{ac}, #{washer}, #{fridge}, #{tv}, #{stove}, #{microw}, #{bed}, #{desk}, #{closet}, #{shelf})
insert into room_price(dep, dtype, mrent, yrent, mfeec) values(#{dep}, #{dtype}, #{mrent}, #{yrent}, #{mfeec})
insert into room_attach(uuid, uploadpath, filename) values(#{uuid}, #{uploadpath}, #{filename})
